try.command: merge into rps.cbc_rps_lkp b using ( select CLAIM_GID,LAST_UPDT_TS, l.STMT_ID from rps.cbc_rps_lkp a , rps.l_stmt_cycle l where a.LAST_UPDT_TS between l.STMT_BEGIN_TS and l.STMT_END_TS) z on b.CLAIM_GID=z.CLAIM_GID and b.LAST_UPDT_TS=z.LAST_UPDT_TS when matched then update set b.STMT_ID=z.STMT_ID
